Pas de classes
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {Klass} from "../../model/klass.model"; import {KlassService} from "../klass.service"; import {SchoolService} from "../school.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-klass-list', templateUrl: './klass-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./klass-list.component.css'] }) export class KlassListComponent { klasses: Klass[] = [] constructor(private klassServ: KlassService, private schoolServ:SchoolService, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit(): void { const id = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.paramMap.get("sId") || ""; if (id != '') { this.schoolServ.findAllKlassesBySchool(+id).subscribe(v => this.klasses = v) } } }
